i18n.title: Little Fighter 2: Wemake
desc: gameplays, arts, and sounds are all from "Litter Fighter 2" basically,
created by Marti Wong and Starsky Wong in 1999.
The original author, Marti Wong, has now launched ["Little Fighter 2 Remastered"](https://lf2.net/).
Please purchase it on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3249650) to support the original author.
玩法、美术、音效音乐来自《Litter Fighter 2》, 原作：Marti Wong，Starsky Wong。
原作者 Marti Wong 现已推出[《Little Fighter 2 Remastered》](https://lf2.net/)，
请在 [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3249650) 购买，以支持原作者。

i18n.title: Extra Fighters
desc:
You can download the character packs you want.
Then open LF2:Wemake and drag the "character packs" 
onto the Entry Page or the Main Page.
After loading, you'll be able to select these characters :D
<video width='320' src='https://lf.gim.ink/docs/video/download_and_use_extra_data.mp4' controls>

zh.title: 额外角色包
desc: 你可以下载想要的角色包
然后打开LF2:Wemake，将 '角色包' 拖拽至入口页或主页中
加载完成后，你就能选择这些角色了 :D
